title: Tiger King 2 (pt 2)
description:
Tig and Cheryl wrap up their discussion of Tiger King 2, but not before a lengthy discussion involving bunions, Kathy Najimy, and Carole Baskin's bizarre diary entries. Plus, an entire series of BRAGGADOCIOUS ALERTS you won't want to miss! *this episode spills beans* get True Story merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)
